New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 30 points, 11 rebounds, and 14 assists.
Jamal Murray scored a career-high 28 points on 9-of-17 shooting with four 3-pointers.
Michael Porter Jr. and Christian Braun each scored 21 points, and Peyton Watson had 16 points in his NBA debut.
Key Match Events: The Nuggets shot 61.7% from the field and 51.4% from 3-point range, finishing in the 96th percentile in offensive rating.
Jimmy Butler sprained his right ankle in the first quarter and did not return.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets extended their regular-season winning streak over the Heat to nine consecutive games.
The Heat have now lost three straight games and are 0-3 against the Western Conference this season.
